thread.title: Tina S - NY
thread.title_full: DoItYourselfLettering.com reviewed by Tina S - NY

author: Tina S - NY
title: Tina S - NY
text:
I purchased lettering for a brick wall- and was worried about whether or not it would stick/stay.
I am so pleased that a month later, the letters are still in place- and they aren't going anywhere.
Went on easy - stayed on.
Quick ship and good price.
Great purchase!! ğŸ‘ğŸ»ğŸ‘ğŸ»ğŸ‘ğŸ»ğŸ‘ğŸ»ğŸ‘ğŸ»
